SPELLBOOK.Analytics.ClearDataContent: This will permanently delete all spell usage data. This cannot be undone!
SPELLBOOK.Analytics.ImportConfirmContent: This will overwrite existing spell data. Continue?
SPELLBOOK.Analytics.ImportSuccessWithCou: Successfully imported data for {imported} users. {skipped} users were skipped.
SPELLBOOK.Analytics.ImportWarningMessage: This will overwrite existing spell data for these users.
SPELLBOOK.Analytics.TrackingDisabled: Spell usage tracking is disabled. Right-click to enable.
SPELLBOOK.Analytics.TrackingEnabled: Spell usage tracking is enabled. Right-click to disable.
SPELLBOOK.Analytics.TrackingToggleError: Failed to toggle spell usage tracking
SPELLBOOK.Cantrips.LevelUpModern: レベルが上がりました！新たな初級呪文を学び、覚えている初級呪文１つを忘れられます。
SPELLBOOK.Cantrips.LockedLegacy: レガシールールでは初級呪文を忘れることはできません。
SPELLBOOK.Cantrips.LockedOutsideLevelUp: Cantrips can only be changed during level-up under these rules.
SPELLBOOK.Cantrips.LockedOutsideLongRest: Cantrips can only be changed during a long rest under these rules.
SPELLBOOK.Cantrips.MaximumReached: You've reached your maximum number of cantrips
SPELLBOOK.Cantrips.MustUnlearnFirst: You must unlearn a cantrip before learning a new one
SPELLBOOK.Cantrips.OnlyOneSwap: You've already swapped one cantrip. You must complete this swap before making another.
SPELLBOOK.Cantrips.WizardRuleOnly: This rule is only available for Wizard characters
SPELLBOOK.Errors.FailedToLoad: 呪文データの読み込みに失敗しました。やり直してください。
SPELLBOOK.Filters.SavingThrow: セーヴィング・スロー
SPELLBOOK.Loadouts.ClassInfo: Manage {class} spell loadouts. Currently {count} spells prepared.
SPELLBOOK.Loadouts.ConfirmDeleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete the loadout "{name}"? This cannot be undone.
SPELLBOOK.Loadouts.ManageLoadouts: Manage Spell Loadouts (right click to quick-select)
SPELLBOOK.Loadouts.NoLoadouts: No loadouts saved. Create your first loadout by preparing spells and clicking "Save Current".
SPELLBOOK.Loadouts.NoLoadoutsAvailable: No loadouts available for this class
SPELLBOOK.Loadouts.NoSpellsPrepared: No spells are currently prepared to save
SPELLBOOK.LongRest.SwapAvailableNotifica: {name} can now make spell changes for: {classes}
SPELLBOOK.LongRest.SwapPromptIntro: Your long rest is complete! The following classes can now make changes to their spells:
SPELLBOOK.Migrations.Apology: We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your data has been updated to ensure compatibility with the latest version of Spell Book.
SPELLBOOK.Migrations.CantripRulesMigrati: {count} actors migrated from legacy cantrip system to per-class rules
SPELLBOOK.Migrations.ChatDescription: The Spell Book module has completed a data migration to clean up outdated flags. This ensures compatibility with the latest version.
SPELLBOOK.Migrations.ChatTitle: Spell Book Module - Data Migration Complete
SPELLBOOK.Migrations.InvalidFlagsRemoved: {count} actors had invalid flags cleaned up
SPELLBOOK.Notifications.OverLimitWarning: You are preparing {current} {type} (limit: {max}). GM will be notified.
SPELLBOOK.Preparation.AlwaysTooltip: This spell is always prepared and doesn't count against your prepared spell limit
SPELLBOOK.Preparation.AtWillTooltip: This spell can be cast at will and doesn't require preparation
SPELLBOOK.Preparation.ClassAtMaximum: You've reached your maximum number of {class} spells
SPELLBOOK.Preparation.InnateTooltip: This spell is innate and doesn't require preparation
SPELLBOOK.Scrolls.NotPreparable: Scroll spells cannot be prepared, only learned.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CantripPreparationBon: Bonus to the number of cantrips this class can prepare. Can be negative to reduce the base amount.
Cannot reduce {class} cantrip preparation below {total} total cantrips
Cannot reduce cantrip preparation bonus further
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CantripScaleValues.Hi: Comma-separated list of scale value keys to check for cantrip limits. The system will use the first matching key found. Add custom keys for homebrew classes as needed. WARNING: syntax errors may break this module, follow identifer rules.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CantripSwapping.Hint: When this class can swap cantrips
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CantripSwapping.Label: Cantrip Swapping
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ClassRules.Descriptio: Configure spellcasting rules for each class individually.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ClassRules.Title: Per-Class Rules
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ConsumeScrollsWhenLea: Whether spell scrolls should be consumed when learning spells from them in the wizard spellbook.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CustomSpellList.Hint: Use a custom spell list instead of the default class list
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CustomSpellList.Label: Custom Spell List
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CustomSpellMappings.H: Mappings between original and custom spell lists
SPELLBOOK.Settings.DefaultEnforcementBeh: How spell selection rules should be enforced by default
SPELLBOOK.Settings.DisableLongRestSwapPr: Disable the dialog prompt that appears after a long rest when characters can swap spells or cantrips. The spellbook will still be available for swapping.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.DisabledNoScaleValue: Disabled because no cantrip scale value was found for this class.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.DistanceUnit.Hint: Choose the unit to display and filter spell ranges
SPELLBOOK.Settings.DistanceUnit.Name: Distance Unit
SPELLBOOK.Settings.EnableJournalButton.H: Adds a Spell List Manager button to the journal directory sidebar
SPELLBOOK.Settings.EnforcementBehavior.H: How strictly to enforce spellcasting rules
SPELLBOOK.Settings.FilterConfiguration.H: Configure which filters are enabled and their display order
SPELLBOOK.Settings.FilterInstructions: Enable or disable filters using checkboxes. Drag filters with grip handles to reorder them. Some filters have fixed positions and cannot be moved.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.FixedPositionDesc: This filter has a fixed position
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ForceWizardMode.Hint: Treat this class as a wizard, enabling wizard spellbook functionality including spell copying, ritual casting from spellbook, and spellbook management. This creates a separate wizard spellbook for this class.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ForceWizardMode.Label: Force Wizard Mode
SPELLBOOK.Settings.HiddenSpellLists.Hint: Spell lists that have been hidden from view to reduce clutter.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.HiddenSpellLists.Name: Hidden Spell Lists
SPELLBOOK.Settings.LazyBatchSize.Hint: Controls how many spells are rendered at once when loading the spell book. Higher values show more spells immediately but may cause lag on slower devices. Lower values improve performance but require more scrolling to load additional spells.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.LazyBatchSize.Name: Spell Rendering Batch Size
SPELLBOOK.Settings.Logger.Hint: Set the level of logs generated by Spell Book. The troubleshooter will catch everything regardless. Recommended: Warnings.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.Logger.Name: Logging Level
SPELLBOOK.Settings.Migration.Name: Run Migrations
SPELLBOOK.Settings.NoScaleValueNotice: No cantrip scale value found, cantrips disabled for this class.
Opens the GM Spell List Manager to create and modify spell lists.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.PreparationBonus.Hint: Additional spells this class can prepare beyond the base amount
SPELLBOOK.Settings.PreparationBonus.Mini: Cannot reduce {class} preparation bonus further. Total slots would be {total} (minimum 0).
Cannot reduce preparation bonus further without creating negative spell slots.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.RitualCasting.Hint: How this class can cast ritual spells
SPELLBOOK.Settings.RitualCasting.Label: Ritual Casting
SPELLBOOK.Settings.RuleSetChanged: Spellcasting rule set changed. Existing characters will use their individual overrides.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.RuleSetOverride.Hint: Override the global rule set for this character
SPELLBOOK.Settings.RuleSetOverride.Label: Rule Set Override
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ShowCantrips.Hint: Whether to display cantrips for this class
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ShowCantrips.Label: Show Cantrips
SPELLBOOK.Settings.SpellBookPosition.Hin: Config only setting to save the last position of the player spell book.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.SpellPreparationBonus: Bonus to the number of spells this class can prepare. Can be negative to reduce the base amount.
Cannot reduce {class} spell preparation below {total} total spells
Cannot reduce spell preparation bonus further
SPELLBOOK.Settings.SpellSwapping.Hint: When this class can swap spells
SPELLBOOK.Settings.SpellSwapping.Label: Spell Swapping
SPELLBOOK.Settings.SpellcastingRuleSet.H: Choose the default rule set for spellcasting behavior across all characters
SPELLBOOK.Settings.Title: Spellbook Settings for {name}
SPELLBOOK.SpellListChange.Completed: Unprepared {total} spells due to spell list change
SPELLBOOK.SpellListChange.Confirmation: Do you want to proceed with this change?
SPELLBOOK.SpellListChange.Explanation: Changing the spell list for {className} will unprepare {total} spells that are no longer available in the new list.
SPELLBOOK.SpellListChange.Title: Confirm Spell List Change
SPELLBOOK.SpellSource.GrantedTooltip: This spell is granted by a feature or item and cannot be unprepared
SPELLBOOK.Spells.LockedNoSwapping: This spell cannot be unlearned once prepared
SPELLBOOK.Spells.LockedOutsideLevelUp: This spell can only be swapped during level up
SPELLBOOK.Spells.LockedOutsideLongRest: This spell can only be swapped during a long rest
SPELLBOOK.UI.ResetTooltip: Reset (Shift+Click to clear all prepared spells)
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.CopyPrompt: Do you want to copy {name} to your spellbook?
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.LearnSpellPrompt: Do you want to learn {name} and add it to your spellbook?
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.LegacyCantripRules: Legacy Rules: Cantrips cannot be changed during a long rest.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.ModernCantripRules: Modern Rules: You may swap one cantrip during a long rest.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.NewSpellsInfo1: When you find a wizard spell of 1st level or higher, you can add it to your spellbook if it is of a level for which you have spell slots and if you can spare the time to decipher and copy it.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.NewSpellsInfo2: For each level of the spell, the process takes 2 hours and costs 50 gp. The cost represents material components you expend as you experiment with the spell to master it, as well as the fine inks you need to record it.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.SpellAlreadyKnown: This spell is already in your spellbook.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.Unavailable: The Wizard Spellbook is only available for characters with the Wizard class.
SPELLMANAGER.Application.Loading: 呪文リストを読み込んでいます…
SPELLMANAGER.Application.Title: GM Spell List Manager
SPELLMANAGER.Columns.AddSpellsPrompt: Select spells from the right panel to add them to this list.
SPELLMANAGER.Columns.EditPrompt: Select a spell list and click "Edit" to customize it.
SPELLMANAGER.Columns.NoListSelected: Select a spell list from the left column to view its contents.
SPELLMANAGER.Columns.NoSpells: This spell list contains no spells.
SPELLMANAGER.Confirm.Content: Are you sure you want to proceed?
SPELLMANAGER.Confirm.DeleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete the custom version of {name}? This cannot be undone.
SPELLMANAGER.Confirm.RestoreContent: Are you sure you want to restore {name} from the original source? Your customizations will be lost.
SPELLMANAGER.Confirm.Title: Confirm Action
SPELLMANAGER.CreateList.IdentifierNotes: An identifier can only contain lowercase letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).
SPELLMANAGER.CreateList.MergedDescriptio: Merged spell list combining spells from {sourceList} and {copyFromList}
SPELLMANAGER.CreateList.ValidationError: Invalid identifier format. Please use only lowercase letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Creation.Cont: Select a spell list from the left column. Click the "Edit" button to create a custom copy. Add or remove spells using the right panel. Click "Save" when you're done.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Creation.Step: Select a spell list from the left column.
Click the "Edit" button to create a custom copy.
Add or remove spells using the right panel.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Integration.C: When a player opens their Spell Book, the system will check if a custom version of their class spell list exists, use your custom version if available, or fall back to the original list if no custom version exists.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Modifying.Con: Custom lists will show additional controls:
Delete Custom Version: Remove your custom version.
Restore from Source: Reset the list to match the original.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Modifying.Not: If the original list has been updated since your customization, you'll see a notification.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Overview.Cont: The GM Spell List Manager allows you to browse, duplicate, and customize spell lists from compendiums. These customized lists can then be used by players in their Spell Book.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Practices.Ite: Create custom lists before your players create characters.
Test custom lists with dummy characters before using them in your game.
Keep a backup of important custom lists by exporting them.
Consider communicating list changes to players before making major modifications.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Title: GM Spell List Manager Documentation
SPELLMANAGER.HideList.HideTooltip: Hide this spell list from view
SPELLMANAGER.HideList.UnhideTooltip: Restore this spell list to its original folder
SPELLMANAGER.MergeLists.ErrorMessage: Failed to create merged spell list
SPELLMANAGER.MergeLists.HideSourceListsH: The original source lists will be moved to the Hidden Lists folder after merging
SPELLMANAGER.MergeLists.InsufficientList: At least two spell lists are required for merging
SPELLMANAGER.MergeLists.MergedListNameNo: If left blank, will be named '{Source List Name} (Merged)'
SPELLMANAGER.MergeLists.SameListError: Source list and copy-from list cannot be the same
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.CustomList: Spell List for classes with '{identifier}' identifier
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.CustomListsFolder: A collection of spell lists manually created using the Spell List Manager
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.HiddenList: This spell list is hidden from player view
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.HiddenListsFolder: A collection of spell lists that have been hidden to reduce clutter
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.MergeLists: Merge two spell lists into a new custom list
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.MergedList: Merged spell list combining spells from multiple sources
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.MergedListsFolder: A collection of spell lists created by merging two or more existing lists
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.ModifiedList: Modified spell list for {class}, originally from {source}
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.PlayerSpellbooksFo: A collection of spellbooks for players defined as a Wizard
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.StandardListsFolde: A collection of all other spell lists provided by other compendiums
